item.description:
admission: $20 in advance, $25 at the door

http://massmouth-finale.eventbrite.com

SLAM OF ALL SLAMMERS! THE BIG MOUTH OFF  is the final contest in Boston’s second story slam season. Eighteen slams, from SEPT 2012 until April 2013, were produced by massmouth and the winning stories will be performed starting promptly at 6:55PM on APRIL 17th 2013 at the Coolidge Corner Theater, Brookline MA .

Doors open at 6:00PM.

In venues from Somerville, to Cambridge to JP and beyond,  massmouth has hosted a series of story slams where seasoned professionals and fledgling storytellers alike shared their experiences and reveal their insights on the theme that were presented at the slams.

 

At each slam, ten contestants, coming from all walks of life ,told their real life stories.

 

The audience will listen to storytellers tell their winning stories and compete for the grand prize – a week at a medieval Tuscan townhouse. There are more prizes for the winners chosen by the distinguished judges. In addition there will be 1 Audience Choice winner chosen by the audience and will be announced the day after the Big Mouth Off. In between sets of judged stories, the audience can participate in a mini-slam of stories.

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: This Big Mouth Off - grande finale of the story slam season 2012-13
